Q_DESC:
Given two strings of lowercase alphabets and a value k, Your task is to implement the function which returns if two strings are K-anagrams of each other or not.
Two strings are called k-anagrams if following two conditions are true.
1. Both have same number of characters.
2. Two strings can become anagram by changing at most k characters in a string.

Input:
The first line of input contains a String Str1 and second line has Str2. And next line contains an integer k, which denotes number of characters can be replaced.

Output:
Print the respective output in the respective line.

Constraints:
1=K=|length of String|
